Posts.Content: You no what I'm the same way as you (lol) I'm always thinking i got HIV or Aids, i dont no why its like my worst nitemare i guess. Ive had this little like bump on the side of my neck that kinda moves around when you touch it and i swear it's a swollen lymp node or something! I try to not think about it and i will forget about it for a few days even weeks and then it seems like i get right back on that tripp again (lol) you are nto alone girl!!!!
Posts.Title: lump? lymph node? please help

Posts.Content: I dont know anything about the purple mark but I can tell you that I have that same white stuff on mine (LOL) sounds gross!!! You can't really see it or anything but if I scratch in the creases of my nipple i will see it ( how i discovered it I'll never know....lol) So I'm guessing were both fine and its normal
